name: Flick Flight
description:
Please flick in the direction of the arrow that comes out in good timing.
Flicking at the timing when the arrow meter is full makes it possible to produce perfection.
When you issue the perfect 5 times you will be in unbeatable mode and you can unconditionally pass through 10 arrows.

As the score passes by the arrow, please flick to aim for a higher score.
Can you keep up with the increasing speed?
